note:
Chris Bastidas, master of the unconventional and living proof that there's always another way, has not paid rent in over two decades. Author of the game-changing guide 'How to Live Rent Free in 90 Days', he's spent years perfecting his unconventional methods and strategies. Bastidas is renowned for flipping the script on traditional living arrangements, bringing his experiences to life through his words, and empowering others.

https://www.amazon.com/How-Live-Rent-Free-Days/dp/B0C87SCZYY/
